commit.message:
decl.c (elaborate_expression_1): Add EXPR_PUBLIC_P local variable.

	* gcc-interface/decl.c (elaborate_expression_1): Add EXPR_PUBLIC_P local
	variable.  Always create the elaboration variable, if any, as constant.

From-SVN: r180541

+	* gcc-interface/decl.c (elaborate_expression_1): Add EXPR_PUBLIC_P local
+	variable.  Always create the elaboration variable, if any, as constant.
